body:
Hi Niketa,



There has been few changes to SunPath component. Sunpath needs location data and not a number. Check the sunpath example file for an example ([https://app.box.com/s/npvxmdeukoheqaq5v465](https://app.box.com/s/npvxmdeukoheqaq5v465)).



Here is why I changed it: [http://www.grasshopper3d.com/group/ladybug/forum/topics/sun-path-fr...](http://www.grasshopper3d.com/group/ladybug/forum/topics/sun-path-from-ecotect-vs-ladybug)
